data.title: The Top Ranked Boxers of All
data.text:
The Top Ranked Boxers of All-Time from Ghana

Notes: This is a list of the greatest fighters born in this country.

Where a fighter grew up or which country they represented internationally does not factor in to this list.

Ranking Explanation

Rnk Athlete Weight Class Rookie Yr Overall Rank 1 Azumah Nelson Featherweight 1979 60 2 Ike Quartey Welterweight 1988 349 3 Nana Konadu Bantamweight 1985 418 4 David Kotey Featherweight 1966 717 5 Floyd Robertson Featherweight 1956 772 6 Joseph Agbeko Bantamweight 1998 904 7 Isaac Dogboe Featherweight 2013 913 8 Love Allotey Featherweight 1956 957 9 Joshua Clottey Welterweight 1995 1070 10 Richard Commey Lightweight 2011 1072 11 Roy Ankrah Featherweight 1950 1423 12 Alfred Kotey Bantamweight 1988 1926 13 Duke Micah Bantamweight 2012 2895 14 Habib Ahmed Middleweight 2011 2916 15 Sena Agbeko Middleweight 2011 2926 16 Rafael Mensah Lightweight 2010 2941 17 Patrick Allotey Middleweight 2006 3046 18 Joseph Laryea Lightweight 2002 3129 19 Maxwell Awuku Lightweight 2002 3135 20 Adama Osumanu Middleweight 2001 3147 21 Steve Dotse Bantamweight 1993 3371 22 Francis Ampofo Flyweight 1990 3456 23 Joe Tetteh Featherweight 1957 5249 24 Prince Mama Mohammed Cruiserweight 1979 5351 25 Ben Tackie Welterweight 1994 5740 26 Samuel Takyi Featherweight 2020 5767 27 Amon Kotey Welterweight 1974 6093 28 Prince Amartey Middleweight 1972 6117 29 Kofi Jantuah Middleweight 1993 6269 30 Bob Allotey Bantamweight 1957 6514 31 Alex Baba Flyweight 1993 6589 32 Sulley Shittu Bantamweight 1971 6590 33 Eddie Blay Welterweight 1967 6839 34 Emmanuel Tagoe Lightweight 2004 7044 35 Osumanu Adama Middleweight 2010 7079 36 Peter Cobblah Lightweight 1952 7158 37 Joshua Buatsi Light Heavyweight 2017 7210 38 David Tetteh Lightweight 1993 7698 39 Dennis Adjei Featherweight 1959 8005 40 Kimpo Amarfio Lightweight 1956 8551 41 Aryee Jackson Lightweight 1955 8576 42 Jackson Osei Bonsu Welterweight 2001 8628 43 Teddy Meho Middleweight 1956 8699 44 Ossie Duran Middleweight 1996 8873 45 Tee Jay Cruiserweight 1985 9010 46 Emmanuel Clottey Welterweight 1995 9043
